entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing near noon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 March 2023
